title: President Donald J. Trump Is Committed to Women’s Economic Empowerment Around the World – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
February 7, 2019
By investing in women around the world, we’re investing in families, we’re investing in prosperity, and we’re investing in peace.
						President Donald J. Trump					PROMOTING ECONOMIC EMPOWERMENT FOR WOMEN: The Trump Administration is launching a historic initiative to empower women globally to fulfill their economic potential.SUPPORTING OPPORTUNITIES TO ENSURE GLOBAL STABILITY: When women are empowered, they spur economic growth and help create stable societies.BUILDING ON OUR EFFORTS: Improving the role and ability of women to participate in the global economy is a critical issue and a high priority for President Donald J. Trump.W-GDP DELIVERABLES: The Trump Administration is excited to announce these new and expanded programs and partnerships as part of the W-GDP initiative.
